author: Steve Jobs
text: Design is not just what it looks like and feels like. Design is how it works.

author: Bill Gates
text: Your most unhappy customers are your greatest source of learning.

author: Mark Zuckerberg
text: I think a simple rule of business is, if you do the things that are easier first, then you can actually make a lot of progress.

author: Elon Musk
text: When something is important enough, you do it even if the odds are not in your favor.

author: Larry Page
text: If you're changing the world, you're working on important things. You're excited to get up in the morning.
